   contain the root `toctree` directive.

physoce-py
==========
A collection of Python tools for physical oceanography. Includes functions for plotting, time series analysis, statistics and surface wave dynamics. 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   install
   usage
